creator: McNeil-PPC
descriptionHtml:
Wondering how today’s allergy forecast will affect your seasonal allergies? Are your seasonal allergies so bad that you always check the pollen count and allergy map before you head out? Muddle no more!

The Zyrtec® AllergyCast® app helps take the guesswork out of managing your allergies. Our new symptom prediction technology calculates how severe your symptoms may feel so you can prepare for each day.

How Personal Allergy Impact Works

When you first download the app, we’ll provide you with the pollen level in your area based on your zip code. Each day for 5 days, you’ll track your symptoms in the app.

After 5 days of tracking, we’ll unlock your Personal Allergy Impact score. This personalized score lets you know how your allergy symptoms should really feel that day. The more you track, the smarter and more personalized our predictions become.

In addition to your daily Personal Allergy Impact, you’ll get a fresh-looking app that includes these features:

· Weather forecasts for your zip code that updates based on your current location

· Simple allergy tips to help you feel your best

· An enhanced allergy symptom tracker

· Allergy insights and trends based on your tracked symptoms
descriptionShort: ALLERGYCAST® helps log & track your pollen symptoms and shows the ALLERGY IMPACT

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
· Minor Bugfixes and Enhancements to the User Experience
· Fix issue some users were facing regarding app launch crashes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated look and feel
- Allergy insights based on the day’s weather
- Simplified onboarding experience
- New charts and graphs to see historical symptoms and trends
- 3-day pollen and allergy forecasts

Personalized Predictions at Your Fingertips
When you first download the app, we’ll provide you with the pollen level in your area based on your zip code. Each day for 5 days, you’ll track your symptoms in the app.

After 5 days of tracking, we’ll unlock your personalized symptom predictions. This rating, on a scale from Low to Severe, lets you know how your allergy symptoms should really feel that day. The more you track, the smarter and more personalized our predictions become.

In addition to your daily symptom predictions, you’ll get a fresh-looking app that includes these features:
- Weather forecasts and insights for your zip code that updates based on your current location
- An enhanced allergy symptom tracker
- Allergy trends based on your tracked symptoms and treatments
- A list of the top allergens in your area
- A 3-day allergy symptom forecast
descriptionShort: ALLERGYCAST® helps log & track your pollen symptoms and shows the ALLERGY IMPACT

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and enhancements

title: ZYRTEC® AllergyCast®

creator: McNeil-PPC
descriptionHtml:
Wondering how today's allergy forecast will affect your seasonal allergies? Are your seasonal allergies so bad that you always check the pollen count and allergy map before you head out for the day? The Zyrtec® AllergyCast® app helps take some of the guesswork out of managing your allergies. It uses advanced technology developed by Zyrtec® allergy experts to predict how your allergy symptoms may make you feel so you can prepare for each day. It's like a "real-feel" forecast for your allergies!

Personalized Prediction at Your Fingertips
When you start using the app, you’ll receive pollen levels and a generalized symptom severity prediction based on data including local pollen levels, weather conditions, and air quality. To unlock personalized symptom severity predictions, simply sign in and track your symptoms. The more consistently you log, the more personalized your symptom severity predictions will become.

After you've started tracking symptoms, you'll get a daily symptom severity prediction, as well as a forecast for the next several days! It's calculated using unique-to-you factors like your tracked symptoms and the local weather, with some help from Zyrtec®'s allergy experts. This rating, on a scale from Low to Severe, lets you know how your allergy symptoms should really feel that day. The more you track, the smarter and more personalized our predictions become.

In additional to your daily symptom severity predictions, you'll get a fresh-looking app that includes these features:

- Multi-day forecasts for symptom severity predictions, pollen, weather, and air quality based on your current location
- An enhanced allergy symptom tracker
- Allergy trends based on your tracked symptoms and treatments
- Personalized allergy profile to learn what specific pollens may be triggers for your outdoor allergies
- A list of the top allergens in your area
- Exclusive savings offers for Zyrtec® products
- Access to pollen heatmap to see local allergens
- Access to telehealth providers for any questions you may have about your allergies
descriptionShort: ALLERGYCAST® helps log & track your pollen symptoms and shows the ALLERGY IMPACT

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Updated pollen data source for more granular and accurate predictions
- Multi-day forecasts for symptom severity predictions, pollen, weather, and air quality based on your current location
- Added Pollen Heatmap
- Added access to telehealth providers
- Added exclusive savings offer on Zyrtec® products
- Added Personalized Allergy Profile
- Bug fixes and enhancements

Personalized Prediction at Your Fingertips
When you start using the app, you’ll receive pollen levels and a generalized symptom severity prediction based on data including local pollen levels, weather conditions, and air quality. To unlock personalized symptom severity predictions, simply sign in and track your symptoms. The more consistently you log, the more personalized your symptom severity  predictions will become.

After you've started tracking symptoms, you'll get a daily symptom severity prediction, as well as a forecast for the next several days! It's calculated using unique-to-you factors like your tracked symptoms and the local weather, with some help from Zyrtec®'s allergy experts. This rating, on a scale from Low to Severe, lets you know how your allergy symptoms should really feel that day. The more you track, the smarter and more personalized our predictions become.

In additional to your daily symptom severity predictions, you'll get a fresh-looking app that includes these features:
- Multi-day forecasts for symptom severity predictions, pollen, weather, and air quality based on your current location
- An enhanced allergy symptom tracker
- Allergy trends based on your tracked symptoms and treatments
- Personalized allergy profile to learn what specific pollens may be triggers for your outdoor allergies
- A list of the top allergens in your area
- Access to pollen heatmap to see local allergens
- Exclusive savings offers for Zyrtec® products
- Exclusive in app activities to earn points and redeem rewards through Care Club
descriptionShort: ALLERGYCAST® helps log & track your pollen symptoms and shows the ALLERGY IMPACT

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Ability to log symptoms for the past 7 days
- Bug Fixes and Enhancements

title: ZYRTEC® AllergyCast®

creator: McNeil-PPC
descriptionHtml:
The Zyrtec® AllergyCast® app is your go-to allergy tracker and pollen forecast tool, eliminating the guesswork in managing allergies. Using local data like pollen count, air quality and weather, it provides a personalized allergy impact score, predicting how your seasonal allergies will make you feel each day. Think of it as a "real-feel" forecast for your allergies!

Wondering about today's pollen count? Get that and more at your fingertips with AllergyCast®. Beyond just pollen counts, the app offers personalized daily symptom severity predictions. Sign in, track your symptoms, and unlock personalized predictions that get more accurate over time.

When you start using the app, you'll receive a local pollen forecast and a generalized symptom severity prediction. Consistently log your symptoms for more personalized predictions. Each day you’ll receive daily allergy symptom severity predictions and multi-day forecasts, factoring in your tracked symptoms and local weather.

Did AllergyCast® predict a "Mild" day? Enjoy less sniffling. "Severe" symptoms predicted? You may want to be prepared.

AllergyCast® App features include:
- Multi-day forecasts for symptom severity predictions, pollen, weather, and air quality based on your current location.
- An interactive pollen map to see the pollen levels in your area & top allergens in your area.
- An enhanced allergy symptom tracker & personalized Allergy Profile.
- Personalized allergy insights to learn what specific pollens may be triggers for your outdoor allergies.
- Trends based on your tracked symptoms, including a personalized Allergy Profile.
- Exclusive savings, coupons & offers for Zyrtec® products.
- Plus, earn points and redeem rewards through our Care Club loyalty rewards program.
descriptionShort: Get your personalized allergy forecast, check pollen counts and track allergies.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New features:
- Add Care Club and Feedback dialogs

Bug fixes:
- Fixed bug that allowed invalid zip code submission on the user profile edit form.
- Fixed various issues with the display of the trends chart.

Other changes:
- Simplify the app onboarding workflow for new users
- Updates the trends screen's chart and historical data summary calculations
- Remove product details pages
- Update various notifications
- Made other minor changes.
